title: Simulation/VR-Based MOOC Mathematics Learning Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Implementation of a customized MOOC math learning environment for mid-level professionals in medical/legal/technical fields through real-time interaction and qualitative observational research

learning_goals: Apply mathematical problem-solving strategies with 80% accuracy in simulated environments
Utilize VR-based tools to represent complex mathematical concepts visually and spatially
Document qualitative observational journals of their learning process at least twice weekly based on peer feedback

resources: VR Headset and Motion Tracking Equipment

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
